brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of SG001 in Combination With Nab-Paclitaxel in Patients With Advanced Triple-Negative Breast Cancer (TNBC)
brief_summary: This is a single-arm, open-label, multicenter, phase II study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of SG001 in combination with Nab-paclitaxel in patients with advanced TNBC.
